casebody.data:
COOPER
v.
BERGER, et al. 315PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019 Jim W. Phillips, Jr., Attorney at Law, Greensboro, Eric M. David, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Daniel F.E. Smith, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Cooper, Roy A. (III). Noah H. Huffstetler, III, Attorney at Law, D. Martin Warf, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Berger, Philip E., et al. Andrew H. Erteschik, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Professor Marin K. Levy.

*404The following order has been entered on the joint motion filed on the 11th of March 2019 to Withdraw Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."
